Package dev.morphia.mapping.experimental

Class MorphiaReference<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.morphia.mapping.experimental.MorphiaReference<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CollectionReference, MapReference, SingleReference
    @Handler(MorphiaReferenceCodec.class)
@Deprecated(forRemoval=true,
            since="2.3")
public abstract class MorphiaReference<T>
extends Object
    Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    use @Reference instead. See issue 1864 for more.
    Wrapper type for references to entities in other collections
    Since:
    1.5

        public MorphiaReference<T> ignoreMissing​(boolean ignoreMissing)
        Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
